text: Innocence is a song by written by Avril Lavigne with Evan Taubenfeld, featured on her third studio album The Best Damn Thing. ==Charts== Chart (2007) Peak position Canadian Hot 100 59 Slovak Airplay Chart 19 Ukraine Singles Chart 11 UK Singles ChartInnocence UK Peak 190 U.S. Billboard Bubbling Under Hot 100 16 US Billboard Pop 100 93 ==References== Category:2008 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Avril Lavigne songs
title: Innocence (Avril Lavigne song)
